languages.text: Через несколько лет став маршалом, Соломон Антар начал реформировать законы Простора, стараясь привнести в них дух справедливости. Такой подход многократно увеличил нагрузку на Адептус Арбитес, и для разрешения проблемы Соломон созвал так называемое "ополчение Лекс Империалис", куда рекрутировали достойных подданных Империума. Это привело к конфликту между исконными Арбитес и маршалом Антаром, а после вылилось в настоящую войну, что полыхала десятки лет и унесла сотни жизней.

After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.
languages.original_text: Через несколько лет став маршалом, Соломон Антар начал реформировать законы Простора, стараясь привнести в них дух справедливости. Такой подход многократно увеличил нагрузку на Адептус Арбитес, и для разрешения проблемы Соломон созвал так называемое "ополчение Лекс Империалис", куда рекрутировали достойных подданных Империума. Это привело к конфликту между исконными Арбитес и маршалом Антаром, а после вылилось в настоящую войну, что полыхала десятки лет и унесла сотни жизней.

traits.locale_text: After becoming marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. The approach led to a severalfold increase of the Adeptus Arbites's workload, to which Solomorne's solution was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia" that recruited honourable subjects of the Imperium. That resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a full-blown war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

That resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a full-blown war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a full-blown war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

languages.text: Nachdem er einige Jahre später Marschall geworden war, reformierte Solomorne Anthar die Gesetze der Ausdehnung, um in ihr einen Geist der Gerechtigkeit zu verankern. Sein Ansatz führt zu einem starken Anstieg der Arbeitslast für die Adeptus Arbites. Solomornes Lösung dafür war die sogenannte "Lex-Imperia-Miliz", für die nur die ehrbarsten Untertanen des Imperiums rekrutiert wurden. Das wiederum führte zu einem Konflikt zwischen den ursprünglichen Arbites und Marschall Anthar, der sich zu einem Krieg auswuchs, der Jahrzehnte dauerte und Hunderte von Opfern forderte.
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er einige Jahre später Marschall geworden war, reformierte Solomorne Anthar die Gesetze der Ausdehnung, um in ihr einen Geist der Gerechtigkeit zu verankern. Sein Ansatz führt zu einem starken Anstieg der Arbeitslast für die Adeptus Arbites. Solomornes Lösung dafür war die sogenannte "Lex-Imperia-Miliz", für die nur die ehrbarsten Untertanen des Imperiums rekrutiert wurden. Das wiederum führte zu einem Konflikt zwischen den ursprünglichen Arbites und Marschall Anthar, der sich zu einem Krieg auswuchs, der Jahrzehnte dauerte und Hunderte von Opfern forderte.

languages.text: Devenu maréchal quelques années plus tard, Solomorne Anthar entreprit de réformer les lois des Étendues afin de leur insuffler cet esprit de justice qui lui était si cher. Cette approche entraîna une augmentation considérable de la charge de travail de l'Adeptus Arbites, que Solomorne compensa en assemblant une « milice de la Lex Imperialis » qui ne recrutait que les sujets les plus honorables de l'Imperium. Mais cette solution ne fit pas l'unanimité. Ce qui était à l'origine un simple conflit entre les membres originaux de l'Arbites et le maréchal Anthar dégénéra en une guerre sanglante qui dura des décennies et fit de nombreuses victimes.
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

traits.locale_text: Devenu maréchal quelques années plus tard, Solomorne Anthar entreprit de réformer les lois des Étendues afin de leur insuffler cet esprit de justice qui lui était si cher. Cette approche entraîna une augmentation considérable de la charge de travail de l'Adeptus Arbites, que Solomorne compensa en assemblant une « milice de la Lex Imperialis » qui ne recrutait que les sujets les plus honorables de l'Imperium. Mais cette solution ne fit pas l'unanimité. Ce qui était à l'origine un simple conflit entre les membres originaux de l'Arbites et le maréchal Anthar dégénéra en une guerre sanglante qui dura des décennies et fit de nombreuses victimes.

languages.text: 几年后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了科罗努斯扩区法务部的元帅，开始大刀阔斧地改革科罗努斯扩区律法，打算将正义的精神融入律法之中，而他的改革也让法务部的工作量增加了好几倍。索罗蒙的改革方案是这样的——他组建了一支“帝国法典民兵团”，只有整个帝国最遵纪守法的光荣臣民才能加入。一段时间之后，法务部原本的成员与安萨元帅之间爆发了冲突，而这场冲突最终升级成了战争，持续了数十年之久，夺走了千百人的生命。
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

traits.locale_text: 几年后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了科罗努斯扩区法务部的元帅，开始大刀阔斧地改革科罗努斯扩区律法，打算将正义的精神融入律法之中，而他的改革也让法务部的工作量增加了好几倍。索罗蒙的改革方案是这样的——他组建了一支“帝国法典民兵团”，只有整个帝国最遵纪守法的光荣臣民才能加入。一段时间之后，法务部原本的成员与安萨元帅之间爆发了冲突，而这场冲突最终升级成了战争，持续了数十年之久，夺走了千百人的生命。
几年后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了科罗努斯扩区法务部的元帅，开始大刀阔斧地改革科罗努斯扩区律法，打算将正义的精神融入律法之中，而他的改革也让法务部的工作量增加了好几倍。索罗蒙的改革方案是这样的——他组建了一支“帝国法典民兵团”，只有整个帝国最遵纪守法的光荣臣民才能加入。一段时间之后，法务部原本的成员与安萨元帅之间爆发了冲突，而这场冲突最终升级成了一场全面战争，持续了数十年之久，夺走了千百人的生命。

languages.text: Años después, tras convertirse en Mariscal, Solomorne Anthar empezó a reformar las leyes de la Extensión en pos de la justicia. Esto resultó en una carga de trabajo mucho más elevada para el Adeptus Arbites. Como solución, Solomorne decidió organizar una «milicia de la Lex Imperialis», que reclutaba únicamente a los súbditos más honrados del Imperium. Esto acabó dando paso a un conflicto entre los Arbitrator originales y el Mariscal Anthar, que finalmente estalló en una guerra que se extendió durante décadas y se cobró cientos de vidas.
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

traits.locale_text: Años después, tras convertirse en Mariscal, Solomorne Anthar empezó a reformar las leyes de la Extensión en pos de la justicia. Esto resultó en una carga de trabajo mucho más elevada para el Adeptus Arbites. Como solución, Solomorne decidió organizar una «milicia de la Lex Imperialis», que reclutaba únicamente a los súbditos más honrados del Imperium. Esto acabó dando paso a un conflicto entre los Arbitrator originales y el Mariscal Anthar, que finalmente estalló en una guerra que se extendió durante décadas y se cobró cientos de vidas.

languages.text: 数年後に将帥となったソロモーン・アンサールは、エクスパンスの法を改革し、その中に正義の精神を吹き込もうとした。この方針により、高等裁定局の業務量は数倍に増加した。ソロモーンはこれに対処すべく、「レックス・インペリア民兵」と呼ばれる部隊を編成し、帝国の中でも最も高潔な臣民だけを選んで募集した。しかし、この動きは本来の高等裁定局とアンサール将帥との間に軋轢を生み、対立が勃発。それは数十年に及ぶ戦争へと発展し、最終的には何百人もの命が失われる結果となった。
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.

traits.locale_text: 数年後に将帥となったソロモーン・アンサールは、エクスパンスの法を改革し、その中に正義の精神を吹き込もうとした。この方針により、高等裁定局の業務量は数倍に増加した。ソロモーンはこれに対処すべく、「レックス・インペリア民兵」と呼ばれる部隊を編成し、帝国の中でも最も高潔な臣民だけを選んで募集した。しかし、この動きは本来の高等裁定局とアンサール将帥との間に軋轢を生み、対立が勃発。それは数十年に及ぶ戦争へと発展し、最終的には何百人もの命が失われる結果となった。

languages.text: Birkaç yıl sonra Miralay olan Solomorne Anthar, Enginlik kanunlarına düzenlemeler getirmeye başladı ve bu kanunlara bir adalet ruhu katmaya çalıştı. Bu yaklaşımı sebebiyle Adeptus Arbites'in iş yükü birkaç katına çıktı. Solomorne'un buna çözümü ise yalnızca İmparatorluk'un en onurlu tebaasını göreve alan sözde bir "Lex İmperialis milis kuvvetleri" kurmak oldu. Bu da kemik Arbites ile Miralay Anthar arasında bir çatışmaya neden oldu. Nihayetinde bu anlaşmazlık on yıllarca süren ve yüzlerce cana mal olan bir savaşa dönüştü.
languages.original_text: After becoming Marshal several years later, Solomorne Anthar began to reform the laws of the Expanse, seeking to imbue them with a spirit of justice. His approach led to a severalfold increase in workload for the Adeptus Arbites; Solomorne's solution to this was to assemble a so-called "Lex Imperialis militia," which recruited only the most honourable subjects of the Imperium. This in turn resulted in a conflict between the original Arbites and Marshal Anthar, which escalated into a war that went on for decades and claimed hundreds of lives.
